   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Scripts for the 5-year Gamma-Ray Analysis
=========================================

This package includes everything needed to reproduce the results of the 5-year gamma-ray analysis with IceTop and IceCube.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Getting Started:

   installation
